name: Tipsy Red Rooster
text:
Mistakes happen but it's the way they are corrected that shows the true difference in customer service quality.
There was a confusion with my address. ‚Ä¶More

name: Erick Wayland
text: I've always had a good experience a this Pizza Hut. Service usually quick and friendly. The pizza is good for a fast food pizza eatery. Peak times can affect their service but overall meet their commitment times.

name: Krystopher Brown
text: I used to love this place. Lately the service and quality of food has gone way down, not because of pizza Hut but because of the lack of care the employees put into their jobs. They did just redo the inside of the place and it looks great ‚Ä¶More

name: True
text: Love pizza here its Good, but its unbelievable that you have to pay $1 dll for pepper when they already saving money on paperplates and napkins cause it's a carried out. ‚Ä¶More

name: Casey
text:
Good customer service.

Ordered a pizza on a Friday night. I should have expected heavy traffic but ‚Ä¶More

name: Chaz Hill
text: Best deals are at Pizza Hut and not Domino's. Best Chicken Wings too.

name: Victoria Davis
text: Ordered online arrived at time of pick up and my order wasnt even started. They stated they were backed up but it looked like they were all talking and standing around saying it would take an additional 30 minutes. Overall a bad experience.

name: Craig Michael
text: If you'd like to wait 90 minutes to get a cold soggy pizza with dry cheese that's at least 90 minutes old, this is the place you want to go.  If you'd like to wait on hold for 10 minutes to order that pizza, this is the spot.  Also, if ‚Ä¶More

name: Miguel Martinez
text: Omg this Pizza hut is so gross! I ordered my food, went back to my office, and saw fresh boogers and DEAD FLIES in my pizza!! HOW THE HELL ON EARTH WOULD THEY SERVE THIS?! I would give a rating of zero stars. The wait time was 50 minutes!

name: Steven Kutzmarski
text: Ordered pizza two hours ago... hasn't arrived and they charged my card. Cool.... you make and deliver pizza, right? Get a clue...

name: Mike Nadon
text: This place put me on hold. Then, after waiting an exceptionally long time on hold with multiple advertisements for stuffed crust pizza, they didn't have any (Which is one of the only reasons I like Pizza Hut in the first place). Absolutely miserable Pizza Hut.

name: Kenny Benoit
text: We ordered a pizza from here. The driver could not find our house and argued with me over directions. When he did arrive 90+ minutes past our order we got to enjoy cold cardboard.

name: Amanda Ward
text: Fast service.. good pizza.. but cheese sticks were a little burnt :(

name: Ismael Ramos
text: Lo cation easy to find and very friendly...and fast..

name: Mark Dederichs
text: I love this place...greatest ever

name: Kristina W
text: Have gotten half of our order before reminding them we are missing it, and the other time waited longer due to pizza being prepared wrong.

name: Greg Webster
text: Sitting on hold for 10 minutes now. It would be great to order.soon.  Now they hung up on me.

name: Jason Forgey
text: Ordered pizza 30 minutes ago and the website was circling.  Wasn't sure if my order went through.  Called the store and someone who spoke broken English asked for my number, put me on hold for 2 minutes, came back and said my name and hung up.   Not sure if my pizza is showing up or not.....never again!!!!!

name: Mandy C.
text: Need more consistency with their baking time, tired of ordering 2 pizza and 1 of the 2 being borderline burnt

text: Well the pizza is good but service is really really really  bad  and no drivers  so i have to came to the store  and get it my self but if u want delivery  is going to take 2 hours  that sock that we dont have another pizzahut arrown  here to go to
